class app.model.Ticket(sEmailIn, sNameIn, crsIn, secIn, assgnIn, quesIn, prblmIn, timeIn, modeIn)

Bases: Model

assignment_name

Assignment student needs help with

course

Course ticket issue is related to

id

Autonumber primary key

mode

if ticket was made for online/in-person help

problem_type

Type of problem student is having

query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

section

Course section ticket issue is relating to

session_duration

Amount of time the tutor spent on the ticket/student

specific_question

Student question about the assignment

status

Status of the ticket. 1=open, 2=claimed, 3=closed

student_email

Email of student making ticket

student_name

name of student making ticket

time_closed

Time the tutor marked ticket as closed

time_created

Time ticket was created

tutor_notes

space for tutors to write notes about student/ticket

class app.model.User(oidIn, permLevelIn, emailIn, nameIn, isActiveIn, isWorkingIn)

Bases: Model, UserMixin

id

Autonumber primary key

oid

ID token returned for the requestor

permission_level

Specifies permission level of user. e.g. 0=lowest, 3=superuser

query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

tutor_is_active

T/F if the tutor is currently employed

tutor_is_working

T/F if the tutor is currently working

user_email

Email of user

user_name

Users name
